hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #stable#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Requiem of Spirit#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path of #time#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Spirit Temple Boss Key#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #13# major items.

GC (Maze).text: Did you know that Gorons understood SRM long before speedrunners did?

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Requiem of Spirit#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Goron Tunic#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Central Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Saria's House#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: Hoot! Hoot! Would you like me to repeat that?

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Fire Temple Small Key# and #the Bolero of Fire#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Spooky Mask# and #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #the Forest Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree GS Basement Back Room

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Bow Shooting Gallery#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Song of Time#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Spinning Scythe Room

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that Okami is the best Zelda game.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Huge Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Magic Meter#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Right Invisible Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Song of Time#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #2# major items.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Ground final reward# contains #a Fire Temple Small Key#.
